bubble-sort_key2: **Sorting** bahut hi important process hai jo aap ko programming mei baar baar encounter hoga. Sorting (Sort is the **root word**) ka matlab hai - kisi order mei arrange karna - jaise height se, weight se, marks se, naam se etc.
bubble-sort_key4: Kam marks se jyada marks (**Ascending Sort**)
bubble-sort_key5: Alphabetically naam sort karna (**Chronological Ascending Sort**)
bubble-sort_key6: Kam height se jyada height (**Ascending Sort**)
bubble-sort_key7: Jyada weight se kam weight (**Descending Sort**)
bubble-sort_key8: Bubble sort ek sort karne ka tareeka hai, jo kuch numbers ko leta hai, aur unko **ascending** ya **descending** order mei sort kar deta hai.
bubble-sort_key10: Iss diagram ko dekhiye. Aap bubble sort ke baarein mei
bubble-sort_key13:
1st and 2nd element ko compare karo
- Agar bada wala element baad mei hai, toh kuch mat karo
- Agar bada wala element pehle hai, toh swap kar do
 (**swap** matlab - **interchange** - yaani pehle element ko doosre se, aur doosre ko pehle se replace kar do)
bubble-sort_key14: Aise hi ab 2nd aur 3rd elements ko compare and swap karo
bubble-sort_key15:
Aise hi karte chalo, isse. 
- Sabse bada wala element ek **iteration** ke baad sabse right mei pahuch jayega
bubble-sort_key16: Yeh iterations jitne numbers hai, utni baar karo - isse array sort ho jayega
bubble-sort_key17: Pehle aap yeh apni **notebook aur pen** use kar kar karo, isse aapki understanding improve hogi.
bubble-sort_key18: Phir yeh **algorithm** aap `code` kar kar implement karo. Yeh ek mushkil question hai, agar ismei aap ko 4-5 ghante bhi lagte hai toh bhi theek hai.
